description.value: Transparencies on Glass for Windows, Lamps, Halls, Etc.--Diaphanie, Vitremanie -- Fancy Work with Leaves, Flowers and Grassess--Phantom Leaves, Autumn Leaves, and Mosses -- Spray-Work or Spatter-Work -- Brackets, Shelves, Mantels, Etc. -- Picture-Frames -- Fancy Leather-Work -- Wall-Pockets -- Work Boxes and Baskets -- Wax Flowers, Fruit, Etc. -- Indian Painting in imitation of Ebony and Ivory -- Cone, Spruce, and Seed Work -- Miscellaneous Fancy Work
